+size_t hashoid::operator()(const git_oid& oid) const {
+    /*
+     * We could hash the entire oid together, but since the oid is the
+     * output of a cryptographic hash anyways, just taking the first N
+     * bytes should work just well.
+     */
+    union {
+        git_oid oid;
+        size_t size;
+    } u = {oid};
+    return u.size;
+}
